function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Development of ontologies for infectious diseases surveillance and diagnosis","Impact":"Limited understanding and lack of standardization in disease classification and surveillance","Mitigation":"Adopt standardized ontology frameworks and collaborate with public health organizations","Technologies":"Ontology development tools, collaboration platforms","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Multilingual ontology for surveillance of infectious diseases","Impact":"Inadequate coverage and accuracy in surveillance due to language barriers","Mitigation":"Implement natural language processing for multilingual data analysis","Technologies":"Natural language processing tools, machine translation systems","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Transformation of ontologies from OBO format to OWL language","Impact":"Loss of data integrity and interoperability due to format conversion","Mitigation":"Implement data validation and reconciliation processes after format conversion","Technologies":"Data validation tools, interoperability platforms","People":"Ontology developers, data managers","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"}]}
